name: Interdimensional Pizzeria
description: It’s the year 2025, everything on earth is totally normal and everybody goes on with their daily life, except for one crazy scientist. This scientist dreams of the big money, however all his previous businesses seemed to fail. Furious, he started working on a new technology which would allow him to travel between dimensions, ultimately giving him access to a larger audience, consisting of, who would have guessed, interdimensional aliens! Now it’s your task to start a new business, selling humanity's best creation to a bunch of aliens!
